Key:
Seems like that unusual date scenario thing's
happened again.
You saw me in an embarrassing situation yet again.

You seemed serious, but also kind of not... I
thought it was cute.

Thank you. But cat ears and a tail... It was an
experience I'm not used to.
It was a rare sight for me, too.
Hehe... Don't tell anyone else, okay?

Okay. I don't think the others would believe me
anyway.
